results.title: Beware beta-adrenergic blockers in patients with severe urticaria!
results.text_hl: We describe the case of a 69-year-old lady with long-standing recurrent @<m>DISEASE_Klippel_Trenaunay_Weber_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007715 @@@angio-oedema@@@ and giant @DISEASE_Urticaria @DISEASE_MESH:D014581 @@@urticaria@@@ who was placed on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Howard PJ, Lee MR. Beware beta-adrenergic blockers in patients with severe urticaria! Scott Med J. 1988 Oct;33(5):344-5. PMID: 3227341
